title: The Magic Roundabout - The Greatest Show On Earth (from the DVD)
description:
<a href="http://www.nickjr.co.uk/shows/magicroundabout/index.aspx" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.nickjr.co.uk/shows/magicroundabout/index.aspx</a>

There&#039;s very little info on the net about this new CGI show on Nick Jr in the UK...The Magic Roundabout has been revamped for the new millenium in the form of a cute program based on the 2005 CGI film. Here are seven episodes taken from the DVD titled "The Greatest Show On Earth". The episodes are:

The Greatest Show On Earth - When a circus ring appears mysteriously in the village, Dougal tries to put together some acts.

Dougal&#039;s Bad Smell Day - Dougal needs a bath. Bad.

Look Back In Gaga - When the Roundabout starts moving backwards, so does everyone in the village.

Dougal Goes To the Moon - Dougal decides he needs a holiday.

The Race - When a race is announced, Dougal vows to win.

Dylan&#039;s Wake Up Call - When Dylan believes it&#039;s "Bunny Day" he tries hard to stay awake to receive a present.

Dogtective - Everyone&#039;s favourite things have disappeared, and it&#039;s up to a certain bossy dog to sniff them out.

I&#039;ve reduced the frame size on these to allow myself to keep the quality high and yet keep the filesizes down.

Visit my new Magic Roundabout fansite at http://www.theneitherworld.com/tmr and if you ever need this reseeded, shoot me an email at sparky(at)theneitherworld.com :)
